## getUnoccupiedCoordinates() function

> This API is provided as a beta preview for developers and may change based on feedback that we receive. Do not use this API in a production environment.
> 

Get an array of the unoccupied coordinates touching the hive.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export declare function getUnoccupiedCoordinates(board: GameBoard): HexCoordinate[];
```

## Parameters

<table><thead><tr><th>

</th><th>

Type


</th><th>

Description


</th></tr></thead>
<tbody><tr><td>

board


</td><td>

[GameBoard](./hive-lib.gameboard.md)


</td><td>

A game board.


</td></tr>
</tbody></table>
**Returns:**

[HexCoordinate](./hive-lib.hexcoordinate.md)<!-- -->\[\]

An array of hex coordinates that are touching the hive and do not contain tiles.
